items.name: Node.js, Express, MongoDB & More: The Complete Bootcamp 2024
items.desc:
Graduates acquire a deep understanding of Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, mastering the foundations of backend web development.
The course imparts practical skills through hands-on projects, enabling participants to build real-world applications and enhance their coding proficiency.
Jonas Schmedtmann's expert instruction ensures learners are well-versed in the latest tools and best practices, preparing them for the dynamic landscape of web development.
Upon completion, students receive a comprehensive skill set, empowering them to confidently design and implement scalable, efficient, and feature-rich web applications using cutting-edge technologies.

items.name: SQL (Intermediate) Certificate
items.desc:
Attained proficiency in SQL through HackerRank's Intermediate Certification, showcasing a strong understanding of database querying and manipulation.
Developed the ability to solve complex SQL challenges, demonstrating problem-solving skills crucial for data-related roles.
Acquired skills to analyze and extract valuable insights from databases, enhancing my capabilities in data-driven decision-making.
HackerRank's Intermediate SQL Certificate serves as a recognized validation of my SQL expertise, bolstering my credibility as a skilled database professional.

items.name: Flutter & Firebase: Build a Complete App for IOS & Android
items.desc:
Gain a solid understanding of Dart and Flutter, starting from the basics and progressing to more advanced topics.
Experience the productivity of Flutter with features like hot-reload, making app development efficient and enjoyable.
Develop a complete, real-world application for iOS and Android, integrating Firebase to create modern reactive apps.
Learn to write production-ready code, ensuring your Flutter applications are robust, scalable, and ready for deployment.

items.name: Problem Solving (Basic) Certificate
items.desc:
Achieved the HackerRank Problem Solving (Basic) Certificate, demonstrating a solid foundation in fundamental problem-solving techniques.
Enhanced my ability to approach and solve algorithmic challenges, honing critical thinking skills essential for programming tasks.
Learned to write efficient and optimized code, emphasizing the importance of clean and effective solutions to real-world problems.
The HackerRank certificate serves as tangible proof of my problem-solving capabilities, validating my skills and boosting confidence in tackling coding challenges.

items.name: Certificate of Training - Data Science
items.desc:
Successfully completed Internshala's Data Science training, gaining a solid understanding of fundamental concepts and methodologies.
Applied theoretical knowledge to real-world scenarios, honing skills in data analysis, visualization, and machine learning.
Acquired proficiency in industry-standard tools like Python, Jupyter Notebooks, and libraries such as Pandas and Matplotlib.
Received a recognized certificate, validating my readiness to contribute effectively to data science projects and providing a competitive edge in the field.

items.name: Certificate of Training - Angular
items.desc:
Completed Internshala's Angular training, gaining a thorough understanding of the framework's concepts and architecture.
Applied theoretical knowledge to practical projects, developing interactive and dynamic web applications using Angular.
Acquired skills in building responsive and user-friendly interfaces, enhancing my capabilities as a front-end developer.
Earned a certificate validating my proficiency in Angular, providing a recognized credential and boosting confidence in pursuing front-end development roles.

items.name: Adobe XD to Android Studio XML- Design implement and Animate
items.desc:
Successfully translated Adobe XD designs into Android Studio XML, implementing a seamless user interface and ensuring a consistent design language.
Leveraged XML in Android Studio to create interactive and animated prototypes, enhancing user experience and engagement.
Gained proficiency in both design and development, bridging the gap between UI/UX design concepts in Adobe XD and their implementation in Android Studio.
Acquired practical experience in the end-to-end process of design implementation and animation, enriching my skill set as a multidisciplinary designer-developer.
